title: RIOT POINTS NOT SHOWING UP
body:
My Card was charge 35$ and my points are not available. 


LN7DB5JVTP.

Not cool. :(

replies.body:
I went ahead and looked into your purchase history and it doesn't look like Riot Games has charged you yet for that transaction attempt. It looks like the purchase failed for some reason, but your bank still has the funds in a pending state. That can happen sometimes with banks when they pull the funds in anticipation of the purchase going through. 

Honestly, those funds should be coming back to you within a few business days, but if you're still concerned, go ahead and reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can go over everything more in depth there!

Sad face. I'm confused but, nevertheless thank you. OH and I'm tilted now. Dumb ass feeding Leona last game. Refused to work as a team, just litterly roamed the map like she was hunting some mysterious unknown jungle animal. Thanks. had 2 get that out lol. Love you riot.
Furthermore, there's no phone service available as you know. So I guess I am at the mercy of the online help support system.
